title: How to UnF**K Your Business with Tomas Keenan
itunes:title: How to UnF**K Your Business with Tomas Keenan
description:
What makes a person the person everyone else looks up to? Our mentors and idols didn’t materialize out of thin air. They got where they are with a combination of pure work ethic, hard lessons and strategic growth. Best thing you can do to get ahead? Learn their stories.
 
Tomas Keenan is an author, public speaker, high-level business coach and the host of the Step It Up Entrepreneur podcast. Through his work at Break Free Academy and his content, Tomas helps ambitious entrepreneurs and business owners make a mark on their communities and the world at large.
 
On this episode of Underdog Empowerment, Zach and Tomas dig into the story of how Tomas established his legend at Break Free Academy, the “eliminate, automate, delegate” system that helps Tomas and his team get shit done like clockwork, and how to find the motivation that helps true badasses smash any and all obstacles (because they will be there). Listen in for an interview that will remove your last excuse for not succeeding the way you want to.
 
Show Notes: https://underdogempowerment.com/tomas-keenan
 
Get More Involved: 
 
  1. Leave A Review & Subscribe On iTunes: https://itunes.apple.com/us/podcast/underdog-empowerment/id1373572178
  2. Free A-to-Z roadmap on launching a top-shelf podcast: https://underdogempowerment.com/roadmap
  3. Access Our Top Resource Recommendations: https://underdogempowerment.com/resources/
  4. Subscribe On YouTube: https://underdogempowerment.com/youtube
